name: SupercupOnline
description:
Online Football Game

Online Football Game
Control only one player not 11.
Same rule on real football.
multi user play.

how can start
1. create room or join room
2. select position
3. ready and start

Control Key
- keyboard
z : walk
x : run
c : heading
v,b : curved kick
- mouse
cursor : direction on kick and run
l click : high ball
r click : ground ball
l + r : shoot
